name: Amber
special_dish: Outrider's Champion Steak! Outrider's Champion Steak!
how_to_get: Complete Winds of the Past, Paimon Bergain
Talent_Materials: Teachings of Freedom 9, Guide to Freedom 63, Philosophies of Freedom 114
Level_Materials: Agnidus Agate Sliver 1 Agnidus Agate Fragment 9, Agnidus Agate Chunk 9, Agnidus Agate Gemstone 6, Everflame Seed 46, Small Lamp Grass 168, Firm Arrowhead 18, Sharp arrowhead 33, Weathered Arrowhead 36,

Constellation.c1: Amber c1 Name: One Arrow to Rule Them All, effect = Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.
Constellation.c2: Amber c2 name: Bunny Triggered, effect = Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.
Constellation.c3: Amber c3 Name: It Burns!, effect = Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Constellation.c4: Amber c4 Name: It's Not Just Any Doll..., effect = Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.
Constellation.c5: Amber c5 Name: It's Baron Bunny!, effect = Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Constellation.c6: amber c6 Name: Wildfire, effect = Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

skill: SharpShooter Type Normal Attack, Explosive Puppet Type Elemental Skill, Fiery Rain Type Elemental Burst, Passive1 Gliding Champion, passive2 Every Arrow Finds Its Target, Passive3 Precise Shot

profile.introduction: A perky, straightforward girl, who is also the only Outrider of the Knights of Favonius. Her amazing mastery of the glider has made her a three-time winner of the Gliding Championship in Mondstadt. As a rising star within the Knights of Favonius, Amber is always ready for any challenging tasks.
profile.personality: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best - albeit only - Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.
